text: Corcelles BE railway station () is a railway station in the municipality of Corcelles, in the Swiss canton of Bern. It is an intermediate stop on the standard gauge Solothurn–Moutier line of BLS AG and is served by local trains only. == Services == The following services stop at Corcelles BE: * Regio: hourly service between and . == References == == External links == * * Category:Railway stations in the canton of Bern Category:BLS railway stations
title: Corcelles BE railway station
